Book
Represents a book entity in the library system.
BookCreationFrame
 
BookDao
The BookDao class provides CRUD operations for the Book entity using Hibernate.
BookDaoTest
 
BookForLibrarianDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a book for the librarian's view.
BookForLibrarianTableModel
A table model for displaying book information for librarians.
BookForUserDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a book for the user's view.
BookForUserTableModel
A table model for displaying book information for users.
BookMapper
The BookMapper class provides utility methods to map between Book entities and their corresponding DTOs (BookForLibrarianDto and BookForUserDto).

The BookService class provides business logic for managing books in the library system.

Isbn
